page.title: 16Services in Waltham St L.
page.content:
Although the villages are only about 25 miles from{London}the houses do not have all the{Main Services}that you would expect in 1985. No houses in the area have{Mains Gas}and so have to rely on{electricity}or{calor gas}for cooking and{oil, coal}or{calor gas}for heating.
Many of the houses in the area, especially in{West End}are not on{ {Mains Drainage}and so have to rely on{ {Cess pits}or{Septic tanks}. In order to cope with this lack of drainage the school has its own{Sewage Treatment {Plant}. Further problems are caused by the very bad natural drainage which causes{flooding}of the fields and roads throughout the area during the winter.
